dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915555M] Violation of website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2007 6:19 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3915555M] Violation of website ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Violation of website Added by system at Wednesday, May 2 2007 07:35 pm X-MailFrom: vespaboutique@cox.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 2 19:35:17 2007 Received: (qmail 15929 invoked by alias); 3 May 2007 00:35:17 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 15926 invoked from network); 3 May 2007 00:35:17 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 3 May 2007 00:35:17 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 19:35:17 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 02 May 2007 19:35:17 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from vespaboutique@cox.net) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HjPHx-0004Lf-EH for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 19:35:17 -0500 Received: from flpi101.sbcis.sbc.com ([207.115.20.70]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from vespaboutique@cox.net) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HjPHt-0007EZ-V3 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 19:35:14 -0500 X-ORBL: [76.202.35.57] Received: from hpnwtf4iac91 (adsl-76-202-35-57.dsl.irvnca.sbcglobal.net [76.202.35.57]) by flpi101.sbcis.sbc.com (8.13.8 out.dk.spool/8.13.8) with ESMTP id l430Z0b0012113 for ; Wed, 2 May 2007 17:35:00 -0700 From: "Sam Darwish" To: Subject: Violation of website Date: Wed, 2 May 2007 17:35:19 -0700 Message-ID: <003901c78d1a$edb88ef0$6801a8c0@hpnwtf4iac91> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_003A_01C78CE0.4159B6F0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: AceNGu06e75Bu3rgR/SuLf7Xscchvw== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 May 2007 00:35:17.0747 (UTC) FILETIME=[EC5C0C30:01C78D1A] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs, This company http://www.fashiondrops.com is using our contact template, whereby they using our template, which has our own code. Whereby their customers are emailing us and calling us inquiring about they merchandise. Below you will find the page which is causing the confusion: http://www.fashiondrops.com/contact_us.php?action=send Our company name is www.intrends.com and the page which they have copied is as follows: http://www.intrends.com/yst-contact-us.html Please take the proper action to stop this abuse. Regards, Sam Darwish www.intrends.com Vespa Boutique, Inc. 17595 Harvard, Suite C-273 Irvine, CA 92614 Tel: (949) 955-9100 Fax: (949) 250-8700 MIME element (text/html)

Dear Sirs,

 

This company http://www.fashiondrops.com is using our contact template, whereby they using our template, which has our own code. Whereby their customers are emailing us and calling us inquiring about they merchandise.

 

Below you will find the page which is causing the confusion:

 

http://www .fashiondrops.com/contact_us.php?action=send

 

 

 

Our company name is www.intrends.com and the page which they have copied is as follows:

 

http://www.intrends.c om/yst-contact-us.html

 

 

Please take the proper action to stop this abuse.

 

Regards,

 

 

Sam Darwish

www.intrends.com

Vespa Boutique, Inc.

17595 Harvard, Suite C-273

Irvine, CA 92614

 

Tel: (949) 955-9100

Fax: (949) 250-8700

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
